custom_guidelines.title: üèóÔ∏è PTSI Clean Architecture (Interface-First)
custom_guidelines.content:
Strict layer separation:

**Contracts Layer (app/Domain/):**
- ONLY interfaces and contracts
- NO framework dependencies
- NO implementations
Example: UserRepositoryInterface, UserServiceInterface

**Application Layer (app/Application/):**
- Service implementations
- Policies (Authorization)
- Actions (Atomic operations)

**Infrastructure Layer (app/Infrastructure/):**
- Repository implementations (Eloquent)
- External services (API clients, etc)

**UI Layer (app/Filament/):**
- Resources, Pages, Widgets
- NO business logic
- ONLY call Services
- Validation in Form Schema

‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: Register ALL interfaces in app/Providers/DomainServiceProvider.php

custom_guidelines.title: üéØ Module Generation Workflow
custom_guidelines.content:
Use kit:make-module for all new features:

**Step 1: Generate**
php artisan kit:make-module Product --with-repository --with-service --with-policy --with-filament

**Step 2: Create Model**
php artisan make:model Product -m

**Step 3: Implement**
- Edit app/Infrastructure/Repositories/ProductRepository.php
- Edit app/Application/Services/ProductService.php
- Edit migration file

**Step 4: Register Bindings**
In app/Providers/DomainServiceProvider.php:
$this->app->bind(ProductRepositoryInterface::class, ProductRepository::class);
$this->app->bind(ProductServiceInterface::class, ProductService::class);

**Step 5: Migrate & Permissions**
php artisan migrate
php artisan shield:generate --all

**Step 6: Implement Filament UI**
- Edit app/Filament/Resources/ProductResource.php
- Add validation in Form Schema
- Implement business logic in Service if needed

custom_guidelines.title: ‚úÖ PTSI Coding Standards (Mandatory)
custom_guidelines.content:
**Validation:**
- ‚úÖ Validate in Form Schema (Filament) or Form Request (API)
- ‚úÖ Service layer accepts validated array data
- ‚úÖ No validation logic in Service layer

**Database Operations:**
- ‚úÖ Wrap multi-step operations in DB::transaction()
- ‚úÖ Use Repository pattern (NO direct Eloquent in Services)
- ‚úÖ Use lockForUpdate() for critical updates
- ‚úÖ Implement idempotency for critical operations
- ‚úÖ Service returns Model (create) or bool (update/delete)

**Security & Audit:**
- ‚úÖ Use Spatie Activity Log for all important changes
- ‚úÖ Use Spatie Permission for authorization (can('permission'))
- ‚úÖ Use Policy for model-level authorization
- ‚úÖ Validate ALL inputs (Form Schema or Form Request)

**Testing:**
- ‚úÖ Write PHPUnit tests for all Services
- ‚úÖ Mock repositories in unit tests
- ‚úÖ Use RefreshDatabase in feature tests

**Code Quality:**
- ‚úÖ Run ./vendor/bin/pint before commit
- ‚úÖ No dd() or dump() in commits
- ‚úÖ Use type hints everywhere
- ‚úÖ PHPDoc for public methods

custom_guidelines.title: üö´ PTSI Anti-Patterns (NEVER DO)
custom_guidelines.content:
**‚ùå FORBIDDEN:**

1. Business logic in Controllers/Filament Resources
   ‚Üí Use Services instead

2. Direct Eloquent queries in Services
   ‚Üí Use Repository pattern

3. Framework dependencies in Contracts layer (app/Domain/)
   ‚Üí Keep Contracts layer pure PHP

4. Validation in Service layer
   ‚Üí Validate in Form Schema (Filament) or Form Request (API)

5. Inline query in Filament Resources
   ‚Üí Call Service methods

6. God classes (500+ lines)
   ‚Üí Split into smaller classes

7. Magic numbers/strings
   ‚Üí Use Enums or Constants

8. Missing service bindings
   ‚Üí Always register in DomainServiceProvider

9. Skipping transactions for multi-step operations
   ‚Üí Wrap in DB::transaction()

10. Returning Response/Redirect from Services
    ‚Üí Return Model or bool, let Controller/Resource handle Response

custom_guidelines.title: üé® PTSI Branding & UI Standards
custom_guidelines.content:
**Brand Colors (Already configured):**
- Primary: #184980 (Dark Blue PTSI)
- Secondary: #09A8E1 (Sky Blue)
- Accent: #00B0A8 (Tosca Green)
- Warning: #FF8939 (Orange)
- Success: #16A34A
- Danger: #E11D48

**UI Requirements:**
- Dark mode enabled by default
- Font: Geomanist (PTSI standard)
- Responsive design mandatory
- Loading states on all actions
- Confirmation for destructive actions
- Activity logging for all changes

**Filament Resources:**
- Use searchable() on key columns
- Add sortable() where applicable
- Use badge() for status columns
- Add bulk actions for admin efficiency
- Require confirmation for delete/archive

custom_guidelines.title: üìù Documentation Requirements
custom_guidelines.content:
**Before committing code:**

1. Update CHANGELOG.md with changes
2. Add PHPDoc blocks to all public methods
3. Update README.md if adding major features
4. Keep docs/LARAVEL_BOOST_GUIDE.md as single source of truth

**For new modules:**
- Document service methods
- Document DTO properties
- Add usage examples in comments
- Update docs/DEVELOPER_WORKFLOW.md if workflow changes

**API Documentation:**
- Scramble auto-generates from PHPDoc
- Add @tags for better API docs
- Document request/response formats
